Welcome to The Crypt

Blog & Portfolio

Welcome to my blog and portfolio! This is where I post new work and the occasional update around illustration, web development and other topics.

Buy my T-shirts!

21 Apr, 2014

Seeing as I’ve been working on some T-shirt designs lately, I have just set up an online store where you can purchase some of my designs on T-shirts – both male and female fits in different sizes and colours.

Currently you can purchase my Scott Pilgrim vs. Dark Souls shirts and my Planet of the Abes shirts and I will add more shirts as time goes on. If you have any requests for previous designs on shirts, just let me know :)

Read more →

Planet of the Abes

15 Apr, 2014

This T-shirt design illustration is based on a poster for the original movie Planet of the Apes (see the thumbnail on the right)

I was limited to only 6 colours, so I decided to create it in Illustrator. Using a Wacom tablet, I recreated the major shading and swapped out the apes with Abes.

Read more →

This is not a painting

3 Apr, 2014

I’m serious. Yes, it looks pretty much identical to Benczúr Gyula’s painting Buda Repossession about the recapture of Budapest from invading Ottoman forces.

So what is it? It’s a 3D render. Extremely talented 3D artist Farkas Zsolt created all the 3D models in the exact same poses as shown in the original, then applied some killer textures. The end result is stunning. Make sure to watch the video below:

Read more →

Scott Pilgrim vs. Dark Souls

22 Mar, 2014

It’s mashup time! As I teased a few days ago, I’ve been working on a T-shirt design this week. I can now reveal that it’s a mashup between Scott Pilgrim and Dark Souls.

As it is a mashup of a movie (based on a comic) and a video game, I realise that not everybody will get this reference, so let me explain:
